meanings.definition: A person or thing that spurts.
meanings.sent1: The water spurter in the fountain was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The oil spurter on the machine needed to be fixed.
meanings.sent3: The ketchup bottle spurter decided to surprise everyone at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The volcano erupted like a powerful spurter of molten lava.
meanings.sent5: The fire extinguisher worked like a spurter, putting out flames rapidly.

meanings.definition: To gush or shoot out suddenly in a stream.
meanings.sent1: The soda can spurter when it was opened too quickly.
meanings.sent2: The burst pipe spurter water all over the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent3: The sneezing fit made him spurter tissue after tissue.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spurter out uncontrollably during the comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The pressure washer spurter dirt off the driveway with ease.
